Generic Attack Upgrades.name: Extended Range
Generic Attack Upgrades.effect: Attacks reach 30 spaces instead of 15 Sp.

Generic Attack Upgrades.name: Long Range
Generic Attack Upgrades.effect: Attacks reach 100 spaces instead of 30 Sp.

Generic Attack Upgrades.name: Perception Range
Generic Attack Upgrades.effect: Attacks can target anyone you can see instead of 15 Sp.

Generic Attack Upgrades.name: Enhanced Scale
Generic Attack Upgrades.effect: Increase the size of Area attacks: Burst: +2sp, Cone: +4sp, Line: +8sp.

Generic Attack Upgrades.name: Precise
Generic Attack Upgrades.effect: Choose which targets are affected by Area attacks.
Generic Attack Upgrades.restriction: Area and Area Direct Attacks only

Generic Attack Upgrades.name: Ranged Area
Generic Attack Upgrades.effect: Instead of the point of origin being yourself, you can target a point up to 15 Sp away from you.
Generic Attack Upgrades.restriction: Area Burst and Area Direct Attacks only
Generic Attack Upgrades.limit: You can be damaged by your own attack.

Accuracy.name: Reliable Accuracy
Accuracy.effect: Advantage (roll 2d20, take higher roll) on Accuracy rolls.

Accuracy.name: Overhit
Accuracy.effect: When Accuracy exceeds target Avoidance by 5+, add half the difference to Effect roll.

Damage.name: High Impact
Damage.effect: Replace 3d6 damage roll with flat 15 damage.

Damage.name: Critical Effect
Damage.effect: All dice explode on a 5-6, cumulatively.

Damage.name: Armor Piercing
Damage.restriction: Cannot take with Direct or Direct Area Attacks. Damage effects only.

Damage.name: Brutal
Damage.effect: When Damage roll exceeds target Durability by 10+, deal extra damage equal to half the difference.

Damage.name: Shatter
Damage.effect: Deal double damage to structures and vehicles.

Damage.name: Leech
Damage.effect: Regain HP equal to half damage dealt.

Conditions.name: Lasting Condition
Conditions.effect: If Condition roll exceeds their Resistance by target's Tier, condition duration extends by 1 turn.

Conditions.name: Contagious
Conditions.effect: Successful condition triggers a repeat attack against a target within Tier Sp of the target.
Conditions.restriction: Cannot apply to AOE attacks, triggers only once per attack. Condition effects only.

Conditions.name: Cursed
Conditions.effect: If 2 × (Condition roll - Resistance) ≥ target's remaining HP, condition becomes permanent.
Conditions.permanent: The condition lasts 8 hours, or until another condition is met (discuss with GM)

Conditions.name: Overwhelming Affliction
Conditions.effect: If Condition roll exceeds Resistance by 3 × Tier, condition becomes permanent regardless of target HP.
Conditions.permanent: The condition lasts 8 hours, or until another condition is met (discuss with GM)

Conditions.name: Concentration
Conditions.effect: As a free action, if this effect succeeds, on subsequent turns, you can make this attack again at the same target.
Conditions.penalty: If you use your free action to make this attack, you cannot use your action to make any attack.

Conditions.name: Critical Condition
Conditions.effect: Condition rolls critical hit on 15-20 range.
Conditions.restriction: Cannot apply to AOE attacks. Condition effects only.

Conditions.name: Powerful Condition Critical
Conditions.effect: Condition rolls critical hit on 15-20 range, Add Tier bonus again to Condition rolls on a Critical Condition roll.
Conditions.restriction: Cannot apply to AOE attacks. Condition effects only.

Critical Bonuses.name: Critical Accuracy
Critical Bonuses.effect: Critical hit range expanded to 15-20 on d20.

Critical Bonuses.name: Powerful Critical
Critical Bonuses.effect: Critical hit range expanded to 15-20 on d20, add Tier bonus again to Damage and Conditions rolls on a Critical Accuracy roll.

Critical Bonuses.name: Ricochet
Critical Bonuses.effect: Critical hit range expanded to 15-20 on d20, trigger an additional attack against a different target within range.
Critical Bonuses.exclusion: Cannot trigger from Double-Tap, Explosive Critical, or other Ricochet

Critical Bonuses.name: Double-Tap
Critical Bonuses.effect: Critical hit range expanded to 15-20 on d20, hit rolls of 15-20 trigger same attack again against same target.
Critical Bonuses.exclusion: Cannot trigger from Ricochet, Explosive Critical, or other Double-Tap

Critical Bonuses.name: Explosive Critical
Critical Bonuses.effect: Critical hit range expanded to 15-20 on d20, hit rolls of 15-20 trigger attack against all enemies within 2 spaces of target if it would also hit them.
Critical Bonuses.exclusion: Cannot trigger from Double-Tap, Ricochet, or other Explosive Critical

Critical Bonuses.name: Martial Artist
Critical Bonuses.effect: Critical hit range expanded to 15-20 on d20, hit rolls of 15-20 choice of Grab, 3-space forced movement, or Prone condition.

Damage Over Time.name: Bleed
Damage Over Time.effect: Target takes identical damage again at end of your next 2 turns.
Damage Over Time.restriction: Target can only be affected by one instance of bleed at a time, Damage only

Damage Over Time.name: Environmental
Damage Over Time.effect: All hexes hit by attack become hazardous terrain, until the start of your next turn, each rank after the first is an extra turn.
Damage Over Time.hazardEffect: Deal attack's Damage and Condition to any character entering or ending turn in affected spaces.

Instant Defeat Mechanics.name: Finishing Blow 1
Instant Defeat Mechanics.effect: If attack reduces enemy to 5 HP or below, enemy is defeated instead.

Instant Defeat Mechanics.name: Finishing Blow 2
Instant Defeat Mechanics.effect: If attack reduces enemy to 10 HP or below, enemy is defeated instead.

Instant Defeat Mechanics.name: Finishing Blow 3
Instant Defeat Mechanics.effect: If attack reduces enemy to 15 HP or below, enemy is defeated instead.

Instant Defeat Mechanics.name: Culling Strike
Instant Defeat Mechanics.effect: If attack reduces enemy below 1/5 maximum HP, enemy is defeated instead.

Specialized Combat.name: Quick Strikes
Specialized Combat.effect: Make same attack two times against single target.
Specialized Combat.penalty: -Tier to Accuracy, Damage, and Condition rolls
Specialized Combat.restriction: Cannot be put on an AOE attack

Specialized Combat.name: Barrage
Specialized Combat.effect: Make same attack three times against single target.
Specialized Combat.limit: First attack must hit and effect, in order to make second attack, and same for the second and third attacks
Specialized Combat.penalty: -Tier to Accuracy, Damage, and Condition rolls
Specialized Combat.restriction: Cannot be put on an AOE attack

Specialized Combat.name: Extra Attack
Specialized Combat.effect: Successful hit with successful effect allows identical attack against same target.
Specialized Combat.usage: Must hit and succeed on both Accuracy and Effect

Specialized Combat.name: Pounce
Specialized Combat.effect: Move up to 6 spaces in straight line toward target as part of attack.

Specialized Combat.name: Splinter
Specialized Combat.effect: Defeating enemy triggers another attack against new target before turn ends.

Specialized Combat.name: Menacing
Specialized Combat.effect: Reducing enemy to 0 HP allows Intimidation attempt against all enemies within 3 spaces of the target.

Specialized Combat.name: Disengage
Specialized Combat.effect: Successful hit prevents opportunity attacks from all hit targets until end of turn.

Specialized Combat.name: Priority Target
Specialized Combat.effect: After hitting target, mark them as Priority Target until start of next turn.
Specialized Combat.allyBonus: Other characters gain Tier Accuracy bonus against marked target

Specialized Combat.name: Bully
Specialized Combat.effect: Damaging target with lower Power score allows forced movement equal to the difference between your Power scores.

Specialized Combat.name: Intimidating Presence
Specialized Combat.effect: When you defeat an enemy, you may immediately make a 2-space burst Condition attack centered on the defeated enemy's location targeting all enemies in the area. This attack inflicts the Taunt condition and uses your normal Condition Check roll.
Specialized Combat.usage: Triggers on enemy defeat, activation is optional

Specialized Combat.name: Terrifying Display
Specialized Combat.effect: When you defeat an enemy, you may immediately make a 2-space burst Condition attack centered on the defeated enemy's location targeting all enemies in the area. This attack inflicts the Frighten condition and uses your normal Condition Check roll.
Specialized Combat.usage: Triggers on enemy defeat, activation is optional

Enemy Type Bonuses.name: Minion Slayer
Enemy Type Bonuses.limit: Bonus applies against 10 maximum HP enemies
Enemy Type Bonuses.effect: +Tier to chosen roll type (choose Accuracy, Damage, or Conditions when purchasing)

Enemy Type Bonuses.name: Captain Slayer
Enemy Type Bonuses.limit: Bonus applies against 25 maximum HP enemies
Enemy Type Bonuses.effect: +Tier to chosen roll type (choose Accuracy, Damage, or Conditions when purchasing)

Enemy Type Bonuses.name: Elite Slayer
Enemy Type Bonuses.limit: Bonus applies against 50 maximum HP enemies
Enemy Type Bonuses.effect: +Tier to chosen roll type (choose Accuracy, Damage, or Conditions when purchasing)

Enemy Type Bonuses.name: Boss Slayer
Enemy Type Bonuses.limit: Bonus applies against 100 maximum HP enemies
Enemy Type Bonuses.effect: +Tier to chosen roll type (choose Accuracy, Damage, or Conditions when purchasing)

Sustained Attack Systems.name: Channeled
Sustained Attack Systems.limit: Spend a Primary action charging up to activate.
Sustained Attack Systems.effect: Spend Primary Action + Movement on subsequent turns to repeat attack.
Sustained Attack Systems.scaling: +Tier to chosen roll for each consecutive turn channeling (maximum 5 turns)
Sustained Attack Systems.selection: Choose Accuracy, Damage, or Conditions when purchasing

Sustained Attack Systems.name: Focused
Sustained Attack Systems.effect: Spend Primary Action + Movement on subsequent turns to repeat attack.
Sustained Attack Systems.scaling: +Tier to chosen roll for each consecutive turn focusing (maximum 5 turns)
Sustained Attack Systems.selection: Choose Accuracy, Damage, or Conditions when purchasing

Uses.name: Charges 1
Uses.limit: Single use, recharges after 1 minute rest

HP Based.name: Timid
HP Based.limit: At max HP with no conditions

Conditional.name: Unbreakable
Conditional.limit: Been hit but took no damage since last turn

Conditional.name: Untouchable
Conditional.limit: All attacks missed since last turn

Conditional.name: Avenger
Conditional.limit: Ally unconscious or great peril occurred

Sequential.name: Relentless
Sequential.limit: Dealt damage to enemy last turn

Positioning.name: Blitz
Positioning.limit: Must have moved more than half your movement in a straight line towards your target.

Positioning.name: Dangerous
Positioning.limit: No allies within 15 spaces, no civilians within 30 spaces

Random.name: Unreliable 1
Random.limit: Roll d20, DC 5 to activate each turn

Random.name: Unreliable 2
Random.limit: Roll d20, DC 10 to activate each turn

Other.name: Charge Up
Other.limit: Spend an action on your previous turn

Other.name: Charge Up 2
Other.limit: Spend two actions on your previous two turns
Other.effect: +(4 x Tier) to Accuracy, Damage, and Conditions

Other.name: Exhausting
Other.limit: Costs an effort to make attack
Other.effect: +(2 x Tier) to Accuracy, Damage, and Conditions

Other.name: Cooldown
Other.limit: Cannot use again for 3 turns after use

Other.name: Attrition
Other.restriction: Can't have regeneration, leech, healing or any other ability that restores HP

Other.name: Drain Reserves
Other.limit: You must have a healing ability, you lose a healing charge

Other.name: Tower Defense
Other.limit: You must have an Active Wall ability, targets must be adjacent to the wall.

Other.name: Compressed Release
Other.limit: You must have an Active Aura ability, Disable Aura until start of next turn

Other.name: Grappler
Other.limit: Must have Grab condition active on target

Other.name: Exploit
Other.limit: Against targets currently afflicted by any Condition

Sacrifice.name: Sacrifice Minion
Sacrifice.limit: One of your 10 HP minions summons is killed, this attack originates from that minion.

Sacrifice.name: Sacrifice Captain
Sacrifice.limit: One of your 25 HP minions summons is killed, this attack originates from that minion.

Sacrifice.name: Sacrifice Vanguard
Sacrifice.limit: One of your 50 HP minions summons is killed, this attack originates from that minion.

Sacrifice.name: Sacrifice Boss
Sacrifice.limit: One of your 100 HP minions summons is killed, this attack originates from that minion.
